definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="world_data_isday"></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="run_function"><value name="function"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">namespace:function</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">clear</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="entity_switch_dimension"><field name="dimension">CUSTOM:Phantom</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="math_binary_ops" x="453" y="316"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.7</field></block></value></block><block type="set_time" x="304" y="411"><value name="time"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block><block type="controls_if" x="413" y="475"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment></block></xml>
